code: import{useState,useRef,Suspense}from"react";import{Canvas,useFrame}from"@react-three/fiber";import{Points,PointMaterial,Preload}from"@react-three/drei";import*as random from"maath/random/dist/maath-random.esm";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Stars=props=>{const ref=useRef();const[sphere]=useState(()=>random.inSphere(new Float32Array(5000),{radius:1.2}));useFrame((state,delta)=>{if(ref.current.position.z>0.9+0.1){ref.current.position.z=-0.4;}ref.current.position.z+=delta/3;});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("group",{rotation:[0,0,Math.PI/4],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Points,{ref:ref,positions:sphere,stride:3,frustumCulled:true,...props,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PointMaterial,{transparent:true,color:"#f272c8",size:0.004,sizeAttenuation:true,depthWrite:false})})});};const Background=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full h-auto absolute blur-[0.5px] inset-0 z-[-1]",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Canvas,{camera:{position:[0,0,1]},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Suspense,{fallback:null,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Stars,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Preload,{all:true})]})});};export default Background;
